content: Generate a sentence with every word starting with a single letter of the alphabet, starting with v and going in reverse order.

Vigorous zebras xylophonically yield zestful waltzes, xenial wildlife vibrating uproariously, treacherous serpents喹quivering, pouncing on nimble mice, leaping kangaroos jeering, indolent hares grumbling, frisky elephants dancing, curious ducks basking, amiable cats blissfully admiring.
